document_data.Activities: Alongside fellow acolyte [[Hesten Jenz]], Mischka preached the word of Waukeen during regular services at the Temple of the Coinmaiden.
document_data.Relationships: Mischka and Hesten oversaw the temple services at the behest of [[Ditch Fundi]], who oversaw the temple's business. Ditch's willingness to defer to the two acolytes was seen by them as a sign of great trust, and they both were fiercely loyal to their boss. In truth, Ditch had ulterior motives and was not truly a member of the [[Church of Waukeen]]; however, Mischka was not aware of this.
